entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
